items.content_html: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.
items.title: gridbox-dev/gridbox-mailer: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.

items.content_html: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.
items.title: MrTG1B/Lumen_Dashboard: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

items.content_html: A classic Pac-Man game built with HTML5 Canvas, CSS, and JavaScript, with assistance from Grok 3 by xAI. This project features an authentic look with a blue maze, yellow Pac-Man, red ghosts, and white dots, all controllable via keyboard inputs. Deployed on GitHub Pages, itâ€™s a lightweight, efficient recreation of the arcade legend.
